<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Grant role to a restriction query</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/api/v2/logs/config/restriction_queries/{restriction_query_id}/roles"}></MethodEndpoint>


Adds a role to a restriction query.
## Request
